column5: Anyone fished this lake in the last couple of years? Looking for info i.e., number of camps, fishing experience, possible trip there in late August. Looking for Large Pike/Lots of Walleye.

Never fished the lake, but would like to. There are at least three camps - Erringtons Wilderness Island in the north end; and Camp Lochlash and Loch Island Lodge in the south end. The latter two are operated by the same owners. They also have two additional outpost camps (Sandy Bay and Otter Island) on the south end of the lake near there two camps. I believe there are also some private cottages.
